verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is the air I breathe (repeat)
Your holy presence living in me
This is my daily bread (repeat)
Your every word spoken to me
And I, I'm desperate for You
And I, I'm lost without You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are the air I breathe (repeat)
Your holy presence living in me
You are my daily bread (repeat)
Your every word spoken to me
And I, I'm desperate for You
And I, I'm lost without You
